title: Spelunky HD (2-click run)
description:
No need for serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes. 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser or other unwanted things.
You can even run this torrent from an USB-Stick.
Easy Uninstall with the Windows control panel.
Choose where you want to put the files on your PC. 
These are a few things that makes a '2-click run' version a better version.

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

Spelunky is a unique platformer with randomized levels that offer a new and challenging experience each time you play! Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with monsters, traps, and treasure. Fully-destructible environments open up lots of strategies and make it a blast to master the game's many secrets.

Installation instructions:
1. Execute the Spelunky HD (2-click run).exe file.
2. Click next.
3. Enjoy the program.
4. When you have the time take a look at the included torrent "My Wallpaper Gallery v1.6.torrent". 
Great tool to change you wallpaper in a few clicks with many updates from time to time.
